event.title: wins state junior championship . Alex Cheng, an eighth-grader at John Adams Middle School in Rochester, was crowned champion on Sunday

data.event: Rochester chess player wins state junior championship . Alex Cheng, an eighth-grader at John Adams Middle School in Rochester, was crowned champion on Sunday in the junior high school division of the Minnesota State Chess Association state tournament.
Players in senior and junior high school divisions participated in the weekend tournament at Robbinsdale Cooper High School.
John Adams middle school chess club members were novices in the state tournament last year and placed seventh.
The team finished fourth this year.
